text: We process data under the contractual lawful basis, with a contract between us and the user.

Our employees and contractors are prohibited from using this access to view your data unless absolutely required.
They will only access your account and view your data when you raise a support ticket, or for training.
We take daily backups of our databases using two seperate backup providers and store the backups on different servers to the ones we use to serve our software.
We may also store information about your browser and how you use the system.
